Mostek peripheral chips block diagrams and pinouts

  • - COMBO_p1 through ..p9: the Mostek MK 3886 universal peripheral unit.
    • : block diagram
    • : pinout
    • : block diagram of the RAM unit
    • : block diagram of the timer units
    • : functional block diagram of timer unit 'A'
    • : functional block diagram of timer unit 'B'

    • : a minimal system
    • : ordering information (bottom table)
  • - RTC_p1 and p2: real time clock with RAM. The pages have an English title at the upper left corner of the picture.
    • RTC p.1
    • RTC p.2
  • - VCU_p1 through ..p3: programmable display controller. The pages have an English title at the upper left corner of the picture.
    • programmable display controller p.1
    • programmable display controller p.2
    • programmable display controller p.3
  • - ADC_p1 through ..p3: 8-channel 8-bit A/D converter. The pages have an English title at the upper left corner of the picture.
    • 8-channel 8-bit A/D converter p.1
    • 8-channel 8-bit A/D converter p.2
    • 8-channel 8-bit A/D converter p.3
  • - ADC1_p1 and ..p2: microprocessor-compatible A/D converter. The pages have an English title at the upper left corner of the picture.
    • microprocessor-compatible A/D converter p.1
    • microprocessor-compatible A/D converter p.2
